class.name: OpenXRMlMarkerDetectorSettings
class.experimental: Marked as experimental due to lack of community validation on Magic Leap devices.
class.brief_description: Abstract base class for marker detector settings.
class.description: Abstract base class for marker detector settings.

members.member: The custom profile to be used when [member marker_detector_profile] is set to [constant MARKER_DETECTOR_PROFILE_CUSTOM].

constants.constant: Aruco Marker detection and localization. The marker id of the Aruco marker is available via [method OpenXRMlMarkerTracker.get_marker_number].
AprilTag detection and localization. The marker id of the AprilTags is available via [method OpenXRMlMarkerTracker.get_marker_number].
QR code detection and localization. The contents of the QR code is available via [method OpenXRMlMarkerTracker.get_marker_string].
EAN-13, detection only, not locatable. The contents of the barcode is available via [method OpenXRMlMarkerTracker.get_marker_string].
UPC-A, detection only, not locatable. The contents of the barcode is available via [method OpenXRMlMarkerTracker.get_marker_string].
Code 128, detection only, not locatable. The contents of the barcode is available via [method OpenXRMlMarkerTracker.get_marker_string].
Tracker profile that covers standard use cases. If this does not suite the needs of the application try the other profiles listed below.
Optimized for speed. Use this profile to reduce the compute load and increase detection/tracker speed. This can result in low accuracy poses.
Optimized for accuracy. Use this profile to optimize for accurate marker poses. This can cause increased load on the compute.
Optimized for small targets. Use this profile to optimize for markers that are small or for larger markers that need to be detected from afar.
Optimized for FoV. Use this profile to be able to detect markers across a larger FoV. The marker tracker system will attempt to use multiple cameras to detect the markers.
Custom Tracker Profile. See [member marker_detector_profile_settings] for more details.
